name: Sabotage (itch) (GeoTech)
description:
Sabotage

The Luddites are a secret organisation in the north of England who fought back against mechanisation after losing their jobs and being rejected from the factories. They seek revenge, destroying the  looms by throwing their sabots (wooden shoes) into the machines, and burning the factories down. The King has now pulled troops from fighting Napoleon  to quell the uprising. 

Work your way through each floor of the factory destroying the looms and killing the soldiers. Use WASD to move and left click to throw your sabots.

This is believed to be the origin of the word sabotage.

This was submitted for the HAGJ 6. There is an issue with movement animations on web caused by the beta version of Godot 4 I used; I stupidly upgraded from 3.5 without making a backup.
